name: Jumpsuit Jumpers ALPHA
description:
An endless jumper game featuring various costumes (in the future) . This is a early Alpha version with a basic gameplay in place. The animations will be tweaked and the overall outlook will be changed, especially the UI. If you can, please leave a feedback and help direct the future of this project.

Use the arrow keys to move Left and Right, press the spacebar to jump. The highscore shield in the main menu is clickable and gets you to the highscore board.
